benchmark_details.name: JAMSessions
benchmark_details.overview: JAMSessions is a new dataset of over 100k user-query-item triples with anonymized user/item embeddings, combining conversational queries and user long-term preferences for personalized music recommendation.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: The primary objective of JAMSessions is to provide a scalable and realistic dataset for training and evaluating natural language music recommendation systems that account for user preferences expressed over time.

data.source: Dataset of user-query-item triplets sampled from the search logs of a music streaming service.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the proportion of relevant items retrieved and the ranking of relevant items.
methodology.interpretation: A higher Recall and NDCG indicates better performance in retrieving relevant items in response to user queries.
